snippet: LEAD: The reigning Miss California, Marlise Ricardos, is a 26-year-old, 5-foot-9, impressively slender Latin beauty who frosts her hair and sometimes wears blue contact lenses when she competes. She's the ultimate self-made competitor, a chemicall...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: The reigning Miss California, Marlise Ricardos, is a 26-year-old, 5-foot-9, impressively slender Latin beauty who frosts her hair and sometimes wears blue contact lenses when she competes. She's the ultimate self-made competitor, a chemically ''sun streaked'' miss who rid herself of both pounds and ethnic identity to please pageant judges.

headline.main: The California Work Ethic: Be Beautiful

byline.original: By ANNE TAYLOR FLEMING, Special to the New York Times
